data.title: Stacey Hayes - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Stacey Hayes: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Actress, model, and spokesperson famous for her roles on soap operas such as Days of Our Lives and The Young and the Restless, as well as television series such as Boston Legal. She has also appeared on multiple episodes of the Spike TV series MANswers. Additionally, she served as co-host on the 3rd season of the game show Lingo.

Before Fame

She made her acting debut in 1999, with a small role in the film The Debtors. Her first television role came later that year on two episodes of the TV show Sunset Beach.

Trivia

She has provided the voice for characters in video games such as Road Rash and Cy Girl.

Family Life

She was born in the United Kingdom, she was primarily raised in Nebraska. From 2000 to 2001, she was involved in a romantic relationship with actor and comedian David Spade.

Associated With
